alert.note: Alert for Southern Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 02 at 1:03PM MST until March 04 at 12:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM FRIDAY TO MIDNIGHT MST FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches with locally higher amounts. The highest snow totals are expected to be along and east of Highway 385. * WHERE...The Southern Black Hills. * WHEN...From 9 AM Friday to midnight MST Friday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates around 1 inch per hour are possible during the afternoon hours, with significantly reduced visibility at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
